smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class VNDetailsFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function onBind has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function get has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface AppComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private property items is unused.
Function parameter query is unused.
Private function shareScreenshot is unused.
Function parameter viewModel is unused.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'com.booboot.vndbandroid.api.VNDBServer' is unused.
The import 'androidx.annotation.ColorInt' is unused.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (dbFlags + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dbFlags + 1
Parentheses in (dbFlags + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dbFlags + 1
Parentheses in (dbFlags + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dbFlags + 1

Parentheses in (dbFlags + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dbFlags + 1
Parentheses around the lambda ({ close(options.socketIndex) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ close(socketIndex) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ close(0) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ close(0) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of Notifications.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function transaction defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class VN contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called lengthFull

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: ROLE_INDEX can be a `const val`.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class Tag implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Screen implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: ThrowsCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of throw statements in methods.

instances.message: Too many throw statements in the function connect. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.
Too many throw statements in the function sendCommand. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.
Too many throw statements in the function getResponse. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.

smells.name: ForbiddenVoid
smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.

instances.message: 'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
